prompt: Create an epic fantasy illustration of a swamp witch known as the Hag of the Moonlit Marsh. She stands in the center of a mystical swamp, surrounded by glowing plants and misty waters. The ancient trees around her have twisted branches and faint mystical symbols glowing on their bark. The witch is cloaked in tattered robes adorned with charms and potions, her eyes glowing with an eerie light. Her outstretched hands are summoning ethereal spirits from the murky water. The swamp is illuminated by a hauntingly beautiful full moon, casting a surreal glow on the scene.
